web_snippets: Miguel Conner is a writer, voice-over artist, and podcaster of several successful shows including Aeon Byte. He is the author of The Occult Elvis.

Bio: Miguel Conner is a prominent figure in the study and dissemination of Gnosticism, serving as the host of the popular podcast “Aeon Byte Gnostic Radio.
